LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.Title: Anomalies Expected
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BakingPies.Re: Limit max amount of Pie Pieces per replication to {0} (0 = unlimited)
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BakingPies.De: All Pie Pieces will despawn, when Big Pie destroyed
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BakingPies.Sp: Will get message during Big Pie replication
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BeamTarget.Po: Precise Orbital Beam Targeter require existence Transmitter to call Beam
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.BeamTarget.Be: Will get letter instead of message, when Transmitter leaving containment
LanguageData.AnomaliesExpected.Settings.ResearchTab.U: Try Unlock Anomalies Expected Research Tab
